item.description: http://www.facebook.c... Please join us in the back room at The Littlest Bar on Thursday, September 22 to watch the sixth GOP primary debate of the presidential cycle. The debate being hosted by Fox News/Florida Republican Party and will take place in Orlando, FL. It is to be followed by a major straw poll on September 24. The lineup of candidates is unknown at this time. The debate stards at 9PM EST. We have the upstairs reserved from 8-11. Some things to keep in mind: -Under 21 admitted with parent or guardian -The Littlest Bar does not validate parking. If I recall correctly, I parked at the Government Center garage last debate for $10.
item.name: Boston Debate-Watching Party
